subject: Questions about shipping in EU
description_text:
Hello,

I am sending this message to ask you about the Simsonn Plus X pedals with a
baseplate - are those available in an EU warehouse or will they be sent
from China with extra VAT and customs charges?
I see that your product is also available on Amazon.de with no shipping
charges, should I opt for that option if possible?

Thank you in advance,
Theodoros Kafazis

conversations.body_text: Hi Theo Kaf,  Our European warehouse is expected to receive stock next week. If the items are available in our Germany warehouse, we will ship from Germany to EU destinations; otherwise, the order may be shipped directly from China.

Thank you for the quick answer. Can I send a message next week to ask if
the pedals have arrived to the Germany warehouse?

Best Regards,
Theodoros

Στις Κυρ 21 Δεκ 2025, 04:36 ο χρήστης support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Theo Kaf,
>
> Our European warehouse is expected to receive stock next week. If the
> items are available in our Germany warehouse, we will ship from Germany to
> EU destinations; otherwise, the order may be shipped directly from China.
>
>
>
Hi Theo Kaf,    You can place your order. Last night, our Germany warehouse received a new shipment, which has already been stocked.

Hello,

I just placed the order #SSN5200 from your website under the
link_q-ropol@hotmail.com email and the name Theodoros Kafazis. Please let
me know if it will be shipped from the Germany warehouse as you mentioned
as otherwise the customs are strict if it's shipped from China and it will
be very expensive for me.

Best Regards,
Theodoros Kafazis


Στις Τρί 23 Δεκ 2025, 02:29 ο χρήστης support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Theo Kaf,
>
> You can place your order. Last night, our Germany warehouse received a new
> shipment, which has already been stocked.
>
>
>
Hi Theo Kaf,    I see your order has been arranged for shipment via China Express, but please don't worry—if any customs duties apply, we'll reimburse you.  Merry Christmas!

Thank you for the update, I will let you know if I get charged any custom
duties.

Merry Christmas to you too!


Στις Τετ 24 Δεκ 2025, 13:39 ο χρήστης support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Theo Kaf,
>
> I see your order has been arranged for shipment via China Express, but
> please don't worry—if any customs duties apply, we'll reimburse you.
